raw_snippet: 166 An Alphabetical List of Invocations by Level The number in parenthesis () are the number of P.P.E. required to use the magic. Level One Escape (8) Mute (50) Blinding Flash (1) Eyes of Thoth (8) Protection Circle: Simple (45) Cloud of Smoke (2) Fly (15) Summon & Control Canine (50) Death Trance (1) Heal Wounds (10) Speed of the Snail (50) Globe of Daylight (2) Horrific Illusion (10) Transferal (50) See Aura (6) Sleep (10) Water to Wine (40) See the Invisible (4) Superhuman Strength (10) Superhuman Speed (10) Level Ten Sense Evil (2) Sense Magic (4) Swim as a Fish - Superior (12) Banishment (65) Thunderclap (4) Control/Enslave Entity (80) Level Six Metamorphosis: Superior (100) Level Two Apparition (20) Mystic Portal (60) Befuddle (3) Call Lightning (15) Summon Shadow Beast (140)â€¦
